      • getResourceUsageData

        public ResourceUsage getResourceUsageData(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                 java.lang.String from,
                                 java.lang.String to)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the usage data for a resource Pseudo Code 1. Load the URL of the rate engine 2. Query the rule engine to get the rate for a resource 3. Convert the resonse into a JSON object
        Parameters:
        resourceName - A string containing the name of the resource
        from - Timestamp for the starting date
        to - Timestamp for the ending date
        Returns:
        ResourceUsage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
